thread.section_title: Movavi отзывы | Отзывы клиентов о Movavi | www.movavi.com
thread.title: Dmitri

author: Dmitri
title: Dmitri
text:
Compare this editor with Pinnacle studio. Tested this software on my old laptop with Core 2 Duo processor and it could handle it with not too much lug. Rendering also went well. In Pinnacle project work stopped at rendering point, looks like took too much resources from my Laptop.
Movavi is very easy to use, with modern effects and transitions.
Soundbar is missing, which I don't like. It is good to observe the sound volume for each clip.
